Uproar looked at his dents and then gives a yawn.  

"Hmm, a good cat nap w=
ould be nice.  Sure, I think I will go in for a little recharge, Sir. Ow, n=
ow they hurt."

With a salute to Rodimus Uproar retires to the CR chambers =
to get some much needed rest.

Meanwhile, Straight Shot and Quickstride loo=
k to each other and then to Rodimus.  Straight Shot nodds.

" I have some t=
raining in basic structural repair Sir.  Tucson taught me a few things, but=
 nothing too advanced."

Quickstride nodds as well.

" I learned a bit of s=
ecurity system programming, plus intermediate structural repair, and forcef=
ield technology. And there's one more that's at the top of my directory.. A=
hh, that's right, I'm also well versed in weaponry research and development=
."

Straight Shot chimes in.

"Oh yeah, ditto, that's actually one of my fi=
nest attributes.  If we're gonna repair the Ark, we might wanna upgrade the=
 weaponry system and security shell."

Quickstride ponders for a moment.

"=
And we'll wanna get some backup generators online too.  It'll come in handy=
 because forcefields do take up a lot of power... Then there's the question=
 of the power source...  The way it is now, we might not have enough ta go =
on, and it would be nice ta fix that and sort of use something that isn't g=
onna harm the planet, but we wouldn't have ta worry about running dry."

St=
raight Shot looks out the window of the Ark.

"I noticed there's some wind =
flowing through on this planet.. I' wondering if we could harness that and =
use that for an alternate power source.." 

Quickstride raises an optic.

"=
Oh yeahh...  Rodimus, Sir, with your permission we'd like to construct a wi=
ndmill turbine to help us produce our own alternate energy source.  This wa=
y, we don't harm the planet and we gather our own energy without robbing it=
 from the environment."
